description:
Part A
The ceremonies to give out the prizes for the Battler Party has now begun. Iruma and the other members of the MagiApp Battler hope to get the Grand Prize! That was also what Iruma had promised Kiriwo. Who will the prize go to?
 
Part B:
Iruma happens to stand out more after the incident with the fireworks. The head of the Demon Border Patrol, Azazel Henri, begins to suspect that Iruma may actually be human and he visits Babyls. Wait, this all seems rather familiar...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une cérémonie grandiose / La protection des humains
栄えある表彰 / 人間の処遇
